casebody.data:
IN RE: TRUST ESTATE OF EMILY ROEDIGER WHARTON; ERNEST BERGER, Trustee, and A. W. BRUBAKER, Attorney, v. BABARA GERMANN, Creditor, and DOROTHY MEYER, CLARENCE C. PERPALL, ONA PERPALL, HAROLD PERPALL, EMILIE PERPALL CHICHESTER, and NELLIE O. S. FINNIE, beneficiaries. 18 So. (2nd) 166

January Term, 1944

May 26, 1944 Division B A. W. Brubaker, for appellants. Robert W. Patton, for appellees. PER CURIAM;

Affirmed.

BUFORD, C. J., BROWN, THOMAS and SEBRING, JJ., concur.
